greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A179072 for p == 1 (mod 4).
comment: It appears that a(n) is even.
mathematica: a72[p_] := Module[{k}, k = (p-1)/2; Det @ Table[JacobiSymbol[i+j, p], {i, 1, k}, {j, 1, k}]];
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_ and _Wadim Zudilin_, Jun 29 2010
